content: I’m currently a Research Engineer at AMD Japan, doing R&D work involving path tracing with neural rendering. I completed my master’s from the University of Tokyo, supervised by Prof. Toshiya Hachisuka and Prof. Nobuyuki Umetani. My research interests include light transport simulation, real-time rendering, neural rendering and machine learning.

title: Aaryaman Vasishta
